page.title: 15Dartmouth Castle (cont.)
page.content: Down in the basement it was wet and rocky,there was a freshwater spring and they used to store the gunpowder there.On the groundfloor there were swords,pikes,helmets and breastplates. There was a first floor which had a kitchen with a big fireplace,2 bedrooms,a toilet place and a living room.On the battlements,we hid in a little watch-house.I could see a long way across the sea and the River Dart.Once there was a chain going across the river to Kingswear which they could pull up to keep enemy ships out.There is a display of different sorts of cannon near the gate of the castle.Next-door there is a little church called St.Petrox.There is a shop in the tower which was a Victorian lighthouse.We climbed up the corner tower of the old keep, in the mist we could hear boats,gulls,waves.
